Requests.GetAllSubcategories: SELECT SubcategoryId, CategoryId, SubcategoryName FROM Subcategories
Requests.GetAllSets: SELECT SetId, SubcategoryId, SetName, SetDescription, SetImageUrl FROM Sets
Requests.GetAllImages: SELECT ImageId, ProductId, ImageUrl FROM Images
Requests.GetAllModules: SELECT ModuleId, ProductId, ModuleName, ModuleDescription, ModuleImageUrl FROM Modules
